has
description: Determines if `object` has the given key(s).

name: lib/index.js
lib/merge.js
merge
description: Merges given objects with no recursion.

name: lib/mergeAll.js
lib/only.js
content:
/**
 * Gives you only the wanted keys.
 * @param {object} object 
 * @param {string | string[]} keys 
 * @returns object
 */

export default function(object, keys){
	if (typeof keys === 'undefined' || 
		keys === '*' || 
		(Array.isArray(keys) && !keys.length) ||
		keys === true) return object
	if (typeof keys === 'string') keys = [keys]

	const res = {}
	Object.keys(object).filter(e => keys.includes(e)).forEach(e => { res[e] = object[e] })
	return res
}

name: only
description: Gives you only the wanted keys.

content:
# XOBJ: extreme methods for objects âœ¨
A tiny and delightful library for manipulating objects with it's own strong prototype.
> **IMPORTANT NOTICE**: I'm working on v2 with a different API, The current API (v1.1) will become deprecated. The old API is available on branch `v1`.

{
  "name": "@hkh12/xobj",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "extreme methods for objects",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "start": "rollup -cw",
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "pretest": "npm run build",
    "test": "jest",
    "generate-docs": "esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "object",
    "obj",
    "utility",
    "util",
    "utils",
    "utility-library"
  ],
  "author": "Hosein Khansari <hrk.x11@gmail.com>",
  "license": "GPL-3.0",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj/issues"
  },
  "main": "dist/xobj.common.js",
  "browser": "dist/xobj.browser.js",
  "module": "dist/xobj.esm.js",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jest": "^23.4.0",
    "rollup": "^0.62.0",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^3.0.7",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^9.1.3",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^3.3.0",
    "rollup-plugin-uglify": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "jest": {
    "testRegex": "/test/.*.js$"
  }
}
